Journal.Title: Lung India : official organ of Indian Chest Society

Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID: "And the fire rages on".

Abstract.AbstractText: With the increasing cohort of COVID-19 survivors worldwide, we now realize the proportionate rise in post-COVID-19 syndrome. In this review article, we try to define, summarize, and classify this syndrome systematically. This would help clinicians to identify and manage this condition more efficiently. We propose a tool kit that might be useful in recording follow-up data of COVID-19 survivors.
